Class HumanPlayer

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class HumanPlayer
extends Player
    A class modelling a human player in a game of spectrangle.
    Author:
    Alina Maximova, s2032074

        public HumanPlayer(java.lang.String name,
                   java.net.Socket sock,
                   int preference)
            throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a new HumanPlayer with the specified name, socket and preference.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the player.
        sock - the socket the player uses for its connection.
        preference - the amount of players this player wants to play with.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when the IO streams cannot be created.
